wikipedia_page.main:
David Roy Davies (12 August 1928 – 14 July 2013) was a Welsh cricketer.  Davies was a right-handed batsman.  He was born at Llanelli, Carmarthenshire.  He was educated in his later early years at Cardiff University.
Davies made a single first-class appearance for Glamorgan in 1950 against Somerset.  In the match he scored 7 runs in his only first-class innings.Davies was an industrial chemist and fuel technologist who later worked for Unilever. Davies also played squash, a sport he represented Wales in.
